title: Pork Chops on the Stove
directions: Heat Oven to 400° with iron skillet inside.
Let chops come to room temperature, rub with spices then coat with oil.
Cook each side of chops on a high stove top burner for 5 min a side.
Flip chops and place them in oven and cook them 5 min a side.
If chops do not meet 150° internaly keep cooking them until they do at 5 min intervals.
Let chops cool down under foil for 3 min after temperature is reached.
